data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sinclair, Bradley J. (2012): Revision of Neotropical species of Empidoidea (Diptera) described by Mario Bezzi. X. The species described in Apalocnemis Philippi (Brachystomatidae, Trichopezinae). Zootaxa 3270: 58-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280804
